external_references.description: Henderson, S., et al. (2020, April 22). Vietnamese Threat Actors APT32 Targeting Wuhan Government and Chinese Ministry of Emergency Management in Latest Example of COVID-19 Related Espionage. Retrieved April 28, 2020.
Foltýn, T. (2018, March 13). OceanLotus ships new backdoor using old tricks. Retrieved May 22, 2018.
Dahan, A. (2017). Operation Cobalt Kitty. Retrieved December 27, 2018.

objects.description: [APT32](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0050) collected the victim's username and executed the whoami command on the victim's machine. [APT32](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0050) executed shellcode to collect the username on the victim's machine. (Citation: FireEye APT32 April 2020)(Citation: ESET OceanLotus)(Citation: Cybereason Cobalt Kitty 2017)
